this Pokémon’s head clean off.

Whimsicott doesn’t live in a fixed location. It
floats around on whirling winds, appearing all

It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If
it gets wet, it’ll become too heavy to move and
have no choice but to answer for its mischief.

As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its
cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff
builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.
